welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Morganton, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and historic charm. We invite you to explore and make the most of your time here. Enjoy the local cuisine, friendly people, and all the hidden gems this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lenoir Airport serves all commercial flights and houses all necessary amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lenoir Airport caters to private and chartered flights and offers exclusive services for its passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hickory Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
